    • appointment

      public static Appointment appointment
      This is the appointment being modified. If creating a new appointment, this will be null (set in Appointments)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller for the appointment details form, Lambda method is used in the changeListener for the startTimeCB to filter the endTimeCB times to values after selected time.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the location/url for the fxml file
      resourceBundle - not used in this controller, but required for method

    • toAppointments

      public void toAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates back to the previous screen (Appointments)
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - when the cancel/back button is activated
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found

    • checkFields

      public boolean checkFields()
      Validates the fields in the Appointment form
      Returns:
      true if all fields are valid

    • saveApt

      public void saveApt(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Saves the appointment to database
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the Save button is activated
      Throws:
      IOException
